title: PBE application was sent. Wen can i hope to get accpeted or get any message?
body: I sent an application a while back and when i tried to check my status it kept saying that stupid error 500. I downloaded a VPN and then had to ask to help and now it said my application was sent again. I dont know if it was actually sent and if it was when can i hope to get a reply or be accepted.

replies.body: The 500 error is an issue with accessing the site, but doesn't have any impact on your actual application.  Looking into this for you, I can confirm your application was received, but we can't force admissions.  In regards to the error, it is a known issue and VPN was able to help some players.  I know that's not the case for you here, but hang tight until we get everything back up and running in order.  Hope that helps clear things up!
Alright, i hope i get accepted! The new champs look insanely fun! I haven't been this pumped since Camille!
